name: Introduction to Book Arts
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of Book Arts, including printing, binding, and design.

name: Printing Techniques
description: This course teaches students about the different techniques used to create prints, such as relief printing, lithography, and intaglio.

name: Bookbinding
description: This course teaches students about the different techniques used to bind books, such as case binding and adhesive binding.

name: Typography and Design
description: This course teaches students about the principles of typography and design, as well as the tools and techniques used to create beautiful books.

name: Advanced Bookbinding
description: This course teaches students about advanced bookbinding techniques, such as hand bookbinding, gold tooling, and marbling.

name: Book Arts and Fine Arts
description: This course introduces students to the history and theory of Book Arts in the context of the larger field of Fine Arts.
